ai-mil3.6.10:1.2_0: “Having been swept away by the past, future, and present?”
ai-mil3.6.10:1.5_0: “Great king, do you recall having some business there?”
ai-mil3.6.10:1.7_0: “Great king, why are you corrupted by that mind?”
ai-mil3.6.10:1.9_0: “So, great king, why don’t you say,
ai-mil3.6.10:1.10_0: ‘When you remember the mind? Do you remember it?’”
